thread.title: Looking for housing in or near Anjuna, 4-6 months
thread.title_full: Looking for housing in or near Anjuna, 4-6 months

author: MinnieMeander
title: Looking for housing in or near Anjuna, 4-6 months
text: # 1 My family and I will be staying in Anjuna in January 2016 and staying at least until the end of April, and to the end of June at most. We have two small children and would like a spare bed for guests so are hoping for at at least 3 bedrooms, preferable 4-5. Would prefer a house to an apartment, furnished, and just the right distance from the beach (close enough to be convenient to get there but not so close that we are constantly surrounded by partying tourists). Does anyone know of any good resources for our search? I'm finding lots of shorter term vacation rental websites but not much for someone looking to stay for several months or more. Thanks!
